title: mustavanov
author: mustavanov
content: Hello ,In Miningcore , BCH , ECASH , BTC are supported but only for Sha256d and not Sha256AsicBoost , does anyone have any idea on how to add that algorithm to Miningcore ?

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: This is the first time that I heard of Miningcore are you trying to host a pool?I found miningcore on Github if the algo is sha256d then it only mines altcoin that supports sha256d not bitcoin.If I were you bring your issue to the MiningCore developers if you want any help on how to add more algo in MiningCore.Check this link below you might get some idea of how to add coins and algo.- https://github.com/oliverw/miningcore/issues/1588

comments.author: IT4F
comments.body: no pool software thats open source supports asicboost
